parts.questionText: Given that Mr Tan took more than 4 hours to complete his run, find the time he took for the whole run. Give your answer in hours and minutes.

solution.finalAnswer: $4$ hours $37.5$ minutes or $4$ h $37$ min $30$ s

stepByStep.explanation: Test which value of x gives total time > 4 hours
stepByStep.working: For $x = 112.5$: Total time $= x + (x-22.5) = 112.5 + 90 = 202.5$ minutes $= 3.375$ hours $< 4$ hours ✗. For $x = 150$: Total time $= 150 + 127.5 = 277.5$ minutes $= 4.625$ hours $> 4$ hours ✓
stepByStep.reasoning: We need to check which solution satisfies the condition that total time exceeds 4 hours

stepByStep.working: $277.5$ minutes $= 4$ hours and $37.5$ minutes $= 4$ h $37$ min $30$ s
